title: Can You Shut Your Mouth?
description:
The Pope says having cats and dogs over kids is selfish (00:00:01). Chris responds to our criticisms from the first few episodes of 'At A Theater Near Me' (00:19:00). It's hard to read the situation with Jared Carrabis and his contract. Dave Portnoy addressed the status on his podcast (00:38:32). Antonio Brown calls out Alex Guerrero & wants his money back (00:54:00). Dale Arnold's favorite moment from his career was a play by play call that was not his (01:03:00). Chris switches up the game, Billboard Chart Guy checks in & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
